title: How to Draw Dragon Ball Z

steps.title: Draw the circular frame for the dragon.
steps.content: Draw the circular frame for the dragon.

steps.title: Sketch the basic shapes to build the dragon's body.
steps.content: Sketch the basic shapes to build the dragon's body.

steps.title: Using the original logo as reference, sketch additional details such as horns, the arm, and the shape of the snout.
steps.content: Using the original logo as reference, sketch additional details such as horns, the arm, and the shape of the snout.

steps.title: Complete the sketch before refining the artwork.
steps.content: Complete the sketch before refining the artwork.

steps.title: Use a smaller tipped drawing tool to refine the artwork.
steps.content: Use a smaller tipped drawing tool to refine the artwork.

steps.title: Draw the rest of the Dragon Ball word art using one of the methods shown in this wiki.
steps.content: Draw the rest of the Dragon Ball word art using one of the methods shown in this wiki.

steps.title: Draw the black outlines and remove the sketch marks.
steps.content: Draw the black outlines and remove the sketch marks.

steps.title: Add color to the drawing to create the Dragon Ball Z logo as shown in the intro scene in the anime.
steps.content: Add color to the drawing to create the Dragon Ball Z logo as shown in the intro scene in the anime.

steps.title: Draw 10 small circles slightly apart from one another.
steps.content: Draw 10 small circles slightly apart from one another. This part of the logo is the one added below both Dragon Ball word art.

steps.title: As reference, you can use a Japanese katakana characters shown in http://www.omniglot.com/writing/japanese_katakana.htm to familiarize yourself with the symbols used in the Dragon Ball logo.
steps.content: As reference, you can use a Japanese katakana characters shown in http://www.omniglot.com/writing/japanese_katakana.htm to familiarize yourself with the symbols used in the Dragon Ball logo.

steps.title: Draw the Japanese characters in the correct order.
steps.content: Draw the Japanese characters in the correct order.

steps.title: Draw the Dragon Ball Z logo with the dragon logo over the encircled Japanese text.
steps.content: Draw the Dragon Ball Z logo with the dragon logo over the encircled Japanese text.

steps.title: Outline the drawing and remove the sketch marks.
steps.content: Outline the drawing and remove the sketch marks.

steps.title: Add color.
steps.content: Add color.

steps.title: Draw a quadrilateral shape, make the upper line slightly concave.
steps.content: Draw a quadrilateral shape, make the upper line slightly concave. Sketch a circle inside. Add a parallelogram on the side.

steps.title: Lightly sketch the letters of Dragon Ball Z using the quadrilateral shape you made earlier.
steps.content: Lightly sketch the letters of Dragon Ball Z using the quadrilateral shape you made earlier. Separate the "Z" to fit in the parallelogram. Draw a single star at the center of your circle.

steps.title: Erase your outline.
steps.content: Erase your outline.

steps.title: Color accordingly.
steps.content: Color accordingly.

steps.title: Darken the edges for added emphasis
steps.content: Darken the edges for added emphasis

steps.title: Draw four straight horizontal lines.
steps.content: Draw four straight horizontal lines. Add a parallelogram to the lower right corner.

steps.title: Write the letters that spell Dragon Ball Z.
steps.content: Write the letters that spell Dragon Ball Z. Fit in the "Z" inside the parallelogram. Add a single star inside the circle for your letter O.

steps.title: Sketch out the body of the letters to make it look thicker.
steps.content: Sketch out the body of the letters to make it look thicker.

steps.title: Darken the outline of your letters.
steps.content: Darken the outline of your letters.

steps.title: Add color accordingly.
steps.content: Add color accordingly.

steps.title: Darken the edges for emphasis.
steps.content: Darken the edges for emphasis.
